meanings.definition: The smallest finger on the hand.
meanings.sent2: He hurt his pinkie while playing basketball.
meanings.sent3: The pinkie danced independently from the other fingers.
meanings.sent4: Her pinkie was like a tiny dancer on its own stage.
meanings.sent5: The pinkie, the little finger, stood out in the crowd of fingers.

meanings.sent1: The flower petals were a beautiful shade of pinkie.
meanings.sent2: She painted her room in a soft pinkie hue.
meanings.sent3: The sky turned a lovely pinkie as the sun set.
meanings.sent4: The pinkie sunset painted the clouds in pastel colors.
meanings.sent5: The pinkie ribbon added a delicate touch to the gift.
